name: Project Clean Earth
description:
Rougelite + Hack'n Slash!
An exciting apocalypse world view hidden in a retro pixel graphic.
Sci-fi story and exciting survival action.

Earth contaminated with radiation.
to clean up the Earth that's left only the mutant creeper
The last weapon of mankind, "Bernard," has come.

Strengthen Bernard with dozens of weapons, drones, artifact items and various events!
Complete the Earth Clean Project!

- Strategically combine various weapons and drones, including short distance, long distance, and wide area.
- Loglight Ryu's random artifacts and events are added to play new every time.
- Find out the attack patterns of various and distinctive mutant monsters and target them
- New stages and modes that increase as I become stronger

Enjoy the new Rougelite Hack'n Slash now!
